    • Constructor Detail

      • RMIClient

        public RMIClient​(java.lang.String host,
                 UserInterface userint)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                 ServerNotFoundException
        CLient RMI constructor, it gets the Server interface and binds its interface to the server registry
        Parameters:
        host - IP address of the server
        userint - gui/cli user interface
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - in case of connection error
        ServerNotFoundException
